name: Food Thief
details: Help your character sneak snacks without getting caught!

name: Space Explorer
details: Navigate through the galaxy, avoid asteroids, and discover new planets.

name: Puzzle Master
details: Solve tricky puzzles and unlock new levels as you go.

name: Jungle Run
details: Run through the jungle, jump over obstacles, and collect coins.

name: Math Whiz
details: Solve fun math challenges to earn points and level up.

name: Color Splash
details: Tap and match colors to complete each level with fun combos.

name: Robot Rescue
details: Guide your robot through mazes and rescue trapped friends.
